mapper.select: select trim(idx) as idx, id as username, password, role, name, grade from member0122 order by idx desc
select trim(idx) as idx, id as username, password, role, name, grade from member0122 where trim(idx) = #{idx}
select idx, id as username, password, role, name, grade from member0122 where id = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into member0122 (idx, id, password, role, name, grade) values (idx.nextval, #{username}, #{password}, #{role}, #{name}, #{grade})
mapper.update: update member0122 set id = #{username}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, name = #{name}, grade = #{grade} where trim(idx) = #{idx}
